column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE CAPTURED. SEND IN THE TROOPS. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. RUSSIAN COUNTER ATTACK HAS BEEN REPELLED. OVER.
FOXTROT BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SEVERAL ARMORED CONTACTS APPROACHING THE AIRBASE FROM SOUTH. MUST BE COUNTER ATTACK. ENGAGING. OVER.
FOXTROT TO PAPA BEAR. THE TANKS ARE WASTED. BUT WE HAVE SOME INFANTRY MOVEMENT TOWARDS THE AIRBASE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. COPY THAT. CHOPPERS ON THEIR WAY. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. UNDERSTOOD. GOOD WORK MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
Middle of the night in Everon airbase...
